body.name: COMeap 24 Pin ATX Red LED Power On/Off Switch Jumper Bridge Adapter Braided Cable 21.5-inch(55cm)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: 『Solution』Allowing you to turn on/off your 24 pin/20 pin ATX power supply;
『LED Indication』Illuminated Red LED light indicates that the power supply is on;
『Parameter』Gauge: 1007-18AWG (standard tin-coating copper wire), Length: 21.5inches(55cm), Maximum power: 1000 watts, Quantity: 1pcs, Self-adhesive tape*1pcs;
『Sleeved』With Braided Sleeves for easy cable management;
『Note』The LED light is off when to connect with 20 pin ATX power supply;
body.description: Features: The COMeap 24 Pin ATX Red LED Power On/Off Switch Jumper Bridge Braided Cable allows you to turn on/off your ATX power supply. Specification: Material: 1007-18AWG;Length(including connectors): 21.5inches(55cm); Connectors: 1x 24 pin female ATX, 1x Red LED switch; Including: 24 Pin ATX Red LED Power On/Off Switch Jumper Bridge Cable*1pcs; Self-adhesive tape*1pcs;

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 151 ratings 4.5 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 23, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars An absolute must if you are water cooling your pc
reviews.reviewText: I found this item to be invaluable when it came time to prime the custom loop. All the you tube videos you see show people running the pump for a bit and reaching out to the PSU to switch off the power before the pump runs dry. Considering how quickly the pump runs dry and considering how critical it is to be able to reach and toggle the power button on the PSU (to avoid harming the pump), you really need to have that control at your fingertips. This cable gives you precisely such a control. Works like a charm and this is an item I would recommend very strongly if you are into water cooling your PC.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Convenient to use

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Exactly what I needed for a 8 drive computer case that I originally got to act as my raid file server. I have since gone a different direction, but I loved the compactness of this case and finding a low cost computer case that holds 8 drives with drive trays is very hard.Originally had it setup with a mATX motherboard just to keep the power supply ono to power the drives, but I did not like doing that. With this product, I no longer need that in there and I gutted everything but the drives and few fans. I then installed special adapters and cables that allow me to connect the drives my separate and new file server. With this switch, it allows the drives to get their power from the power supply in that case, while keeping the other computer separate. Yes they will not power off when it does, but not a big deal since its a server and is always on.The only down side is the connections to the switch are permanent, unless you are willing to destroy the shrink wrap on them and mess with cutting/soldering. I sort of hoped the wires could be disconnected from the switch via clamp connectors, but they appear to be soldered on. I wanted to try and wire it up to the actual case switch, but I later realized that is a momentary switch, and this switch is not, so it would not work anyway. But even if I wanted to say cut out a hole in the case to install this switch, without cutting the wires and redoing it, there is no way, but not really willing to cut a whole in this case for that, so I will just let the switch hang out the side when the cover is put back on.Otherwise, works perfectly!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Make sure Psu is off before plugging in
reviews.reviewText: Simple and works as it should.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great switch for DYI, testing and trouble shooting.
reviews.reviewText: This switch is great for trouble shooting or DYI projects. The only thing concern is that the switch runs hot when power supply is running. I would not recommend this for running power supplies for long periods of time. Not sure if this would be a fire hazard if you ran it for hours and unattended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars llego a tiempo para poder probar los componentes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Works, minor flaw.
reviews.reviewText: Switch is smaller than the plug so mounting it into something creates a problem. Looks made to socket into some hole. But cable doesn't detach.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome for filling a custom loop.
reviews.reviewText: I was going to buy just a simple jumper, but this item came up when I added the jumper to the cart. Boy, am I glad I spent a couple more $$ for this. My PSU doesn't have a power switch, so I would have been plugging in/unplugging the main power cable a bunch of times to get the system filled and all the bubbles out. Having the simple rocker switch made life way, way easier. If, like me, you had this item come up when you put a plain jumper in your cart, d o yourself a favor and get this instead.
Einfach nur super das Teil bei einem wassergekühlten PC. Ein muß für jeden Selbstbauer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Does what it says on the tin, and seems well constructed. No complaints after a month.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the Netherlands on July 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: The led stopped working after a couple of monts
reviews.reviewText: The led for 3 out of 4 switches stopped working after a couple of months.The button still works.A bit disappointing 😕

This thing has come soo handy especially for testing and filling a watercooling loop on a computer without the rish of damaging any components. The build quality is very good for the price and works very well. This has now been added to my must have for any water cooling pc enthusiast.
Works perfectly, changed coolant in my loop and this is the way to do it!
